Interface RevelControl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CarouselView, ClockView, ComboView, FlashView, GadgetView, GalleryView, HotSpotView, MarqueeView, PagerView, QRCodeView, RichTextView, ShapeView, SlideshowView2, StaticImageView, TextView, TVView, WebView

        boolean isAutoStart()
        Checks if auto start is enabled. All controls default to true.
        Returns:

      • setAutoStart

        void setAutoStart(boolean flag)
        Sets auto start. If enabled play will begin immediately after template initialization.
        Parameters:
